full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES 'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI DAD SHER DANG LDAN PA'I THU NU MAL DAR KHAN DGE SLONG GI 'DOD PA LTAR, DZA YA PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA SOGS CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DON GRUB AER TE NI GU SHR'I'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
author_simple: DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS,
